snippet.title: Android - Coin Dozer Halloween
snippet.description: A slot machine with gold coins on Halloween theme. Pass a set of levels, collect all available collections and win a victory over great Halloween. Action of the game develops in the house where you have to throw coins on a cemetery. The main thing is to try not to get these coins to the holes where monsters and reductions are situated. Collect additional bonuses which will help you to destroy monsters for some time or will give points or even life. The game has rich physics, a set of special effects, excellent music and a super gameplay. The game also has some modes, namely: arcade, time and championship.
